version_description:
- [New] Weâ€™ve added an easy to use search function.
- [New] The formatting of currency values has been improved.
- [New] The market screen updates when returning to it after an extended period of time.
- [Fix] Various bugs and performance improve
- [Fix] Issue where the traditional Chinese localization was not working as intended.

- [New] Added support for additional currencies.
- [New] Improved formatting of certain currencies.
- [Fix] Resolved issue where the app would misbehave on older iOS versions.

- [New] Add a dark mode theme.
- [New] Improve display of exchanges screen.
- [New] Add support for additional currencies.
- [Fix] Resolved various bugs.

[New] View associated links for a coin.
[New] View content of hyperlinks in description of a coin.
[Fix] Improve the display of long currency values on the market screen.
[Fix] Improve display of exchanges screen.
[Fix] Issue where there are c

- [Fix] Issue with real time coin pricing updates.
- [Improve] General performance of app.

- [New] Genesis data is now shown for coins.
- [New] Supply data is now shown for coins.

- [New] Added CoinGecko Beam support
- [Fix] Layout issues on newer devices
- [Fix] Issue with Beam last updated status.
- [New] Total Market Cap is now shown in market screen.

- [New] Added watchlist functionality for logged in users.
- [Fix] Issues with updating total market cap.

- [Fix] Loading issue with Beam page favorited coins
- [Fix] Chart buttons
- [Fix] Coin page display for Beam

- [Fix] performance improvement
- [Fix] bug fixes

- Fix price chart graph
- Bug Fix and Reduce Crash
- Slight Performance Enhancement
- Added support for tablet version
- Bug fixes and Improvement

- Show Market Cap Ranking at Coin Page and Search Result
- Bug Fixes and Improvement

- Fix Calculator page conversion error
- Bug Fixes and Improvement

- Fix a bug to notify users when internet connection timeout
- Fix a bug to prevent user from getting logged out for no reason
Bug Fixes and Improvement
- Fix an issue where users get logged out if server returns an error.

- [Bug] Fixed number display scale issue
- [Bug] Fixed a glitch with calculator
- [Bug] Enable "retry" on Favorites and Beam section when server is irresponsive
"Price Alert" is here! Choose any of your favorite cryptocurrency and set a price you want to be alerted on via push notification.

- Added All Time High (ATH) for coins
- Fixed bug in user sign in form

- Bug Fix and Reduce Crash
- Slight Performance Enhancement

- Fix price chart graph
- Bug Fix and Reduce Crash
- Slight Performance Enhancement
[#HotFix] Fix Market sorting issue

- Overall app performance enhancement and bug fixes
- Quicker to add/remove alerts or favourites
- Splash Screen is dark mode by default
- Fixed auto sign out when offline
Fix issue when new coins added, price chart not showing

- Trust Score is now available on mobile app (tap on any exchange pair to see it)
- Exchange pairs are now sorted by Trust Score, rather than by Reported Volumes (liquidity matters!)

- You can now add price alert directly on market screen
- Added options to open default starting screen to either Market or Favorite
- Bug fixes and performance improvement

- [#hotfix] Fixed app crashing on iOS (Sorry about that!)
- Bug fixes and Performance Enhancement
- [New Feature] You can now share your bullish or bearish sentiment on all cryptocurrency!
- Bug fixes and Performance Enhancement

- Read Crypto news on the go! We have a new section (pun intended) that brings you all the latest news in real time!
- Calculator function has been moved to the "settings" tab
- Bug fixes and Performance enhancement

- You can now track exchanges stats on the go!
- You can search for exchanges in the app!
- Bug fixes and performance enhancement

- You can now sort trading pairs based on Trust Score and Volume
- Added All-Time Low
- Bug fixes and performance enhancement

- CryptoCurrency Derivatives are now available on mobile app!
- Improve and optimize search function
- UI and UX improvement
- Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancement

- Improve search feature in the app
- Bug Fixes and Performance Improvement

- Introducing Explore on CoinGecko - Get the latest scoop of News, Buzz, Blogs and Podcasts all at once.
- Minor UI tweaks, bug fixes and performance improvement

- Minor UI tweaks
- Fix Derivatives prices
- Bug fixes and performance improvement

- Trending Search is now available in the app
- Derivatives market is now available in Market Tab

- You ask, we deliver - Tap on any point on a chart to view prices at the given date.
- Global Stat charts (Market Cap/Volume & Dominance) are now available in the app.
- Fixed crashing issues and bugs with Search Bar.
- Fixed unable to perfo
- Bug Fixes and Performance Optimization

- Bug Fixes and Performance Optimization
- Volume chart is now available in exchanges

- News upgraded to support 14 different languages - enjoy!
- Fixed app crashing issue when favoriting coins
- Other minor Bug Fixes and Performance Optimization
- Bug Fixes and Performance Optimization

- 60D chart is replaced with 1Y for Price Chart and Exchange Volume Chart
- Bug Fixes and Performance Optimization
- Something sweet has appeared. Do you see it?

- Newsletter now available under "Explore"!
- Candy bug fixes & UI improvement
- Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancement

- Portfolio is LIVE! You can now track your holdings value with our app :)
- Removed iOS clipboard copy bug
- Improved & optimized price charts

- Bug fixes on Candy, Portfolio & Sign up/forgot password.
- BTC/ETH price now shows in addition to selected currency!
- App now remembers if you exit on Portfolio or Favorite tab.
- Repeated Price Alert now available.
- Public notice adde

- You can now add Coin Ticker Today's Widget, Top Market Cap Cryptocurrency Today's Widget and Portfolio Cryptocurrency Today's Widget on your home screen!
- Copy Contract Address feature is now available in Coin Screen

- Refresh coin prices directly in the coin pages. No more pressing "Back"!
- Widgets for iOS 14 user have landed. Have fun!
- Portfolio now shows you total spent for each coin.

- Major performance improvement on Coin Page & Charts
- Widgets - Translation + Bug Fixes
- Newsletter display issue fixed

- Category Filter now available! - Top 100, 300, DeFi, Stablecoins and more.
- Live prices are back in place - no need to restart/refresh!
- Security and bug fixes
- Overall app performance enhancement

- New: Easily swap primary/secondary currency in Coin screen
- New: One-tap to share your favorite cryptocurrency from Coin screen
- Security and bug fixes
- App performance enhancement
Hotfix - App no longer crashes on Price Alert page. Sorry about that!

- Multi-portfolio is here! Organize and track all your holdings across different lists
- Bug fix: You should no longer be logged out of the app forcefully
- Bug fix 2: Currency Switch display issue fixed
- App performance optimization

- Landscape view on Tablet is here!
- [Portfolio] Select different currencies when adding a transaction.
- Bug fix for white screen shown when selecting Candy Reward item.
